name: Videoworld
description:
You are in a living room and there is an open door into the garden. As you walk through the door you hear the words "Standby", "Cue the STAR!". You are the star of a film being made and you have to complete the game by following the script which leads to some crazy adventures.

Videoworld is a text only adventure where the text on screen describes your surroundings and with the keyboard you type in commands to complete the game.
gamePlay: Interactive fiction / text adventure, Puzzle elements
